summary: Provides a worker implementation that handles the processing of each element in an inline Map state iteration, evaluating the item selector against the input data, preparing the execution environment, and dispatching the resulting job to a job pool as part of the iteration workflow.
business_intent: Enable the Step Functions ASL parser to execute inline Map state iterations by evaluating perâ€‘item input and coordinating job execution, thereby supporting parallel processing of collections within a state machine.
